title: Just bought for PS4 and cant even play
selftext: I've been watching this game on PC for years and had been waiting for the release on console. I just bought it today and cant even play it at all. I've not even got to join a server without it crashing like I'm not joking its crashed at least 8 times and I spent 50$ on this?? I'm so sad I wanted to play it so bad and absolutely can not
